summary: Completed comprehensive testing of wedding salon website. Backend APIs fully functional (11/11 tests passed). Frontend features working well including booking flow, admin dashboard, contact form, and mobile responsiveness. Minor UI issues identified but core functionality is solid.

ui_bugs.issue: HTML hydration error - div element inside p tag causing React warning
Form fields not reset after successful booking submission

integration_issues.issue: Admin page routing issue when accessed directly via URL /admin

passed_tests: Homepage hero section with animations and styling
Navigation between all sections (Home, About, Services, Gallery, Booking, Contact)
About section with 4 feature cards (Passionate Team, Award Winning, 500+ Weddings, Luxury Experience)
Services section with 3 wedding packages (Classic $5,000, Premium $8,500, Exclusive $15,000)
Gallery section with 6 wedding images and lightbox functionality
Complete booking flow: calendar selection, time slot availability, form submission
Contact form submission with success message
Admin dashboard access and booking display
Mobile responsiveness with hamburger menu and mobile navigation
Availability checking and duplicate booking prevention
CRUD operations for bookings (Create, Read, Update, Delete)

success_percentage.frontend: 95% (minor UI issues only, core functionality working)
success_percentage.integration: 90% (booking flow and admin features working, minor routing issue)
